data.name: Leppa Berry
data.summary: Held: Consumed when a move runs out of PP to restore its PP by 10.
data.description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is out of PP for one of its moves, it consumes this item to restore 10 of that move's PP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for a selected move.
